com.adidas.connect.ui

Class ConnectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.adidas.connect.ui.ConnectActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountChooserFragment.AccountChooserFragmentListener, BaseFieldFragment.OnSwipedBackListener, EmailSearchFragment.OnEmailSearchFragmentListener, EntryFragment.OnEnterFragmentListener, LegalAgeFragment.OnLegalAgeFragmentListener, LoginPasswordFragment.OnPasswordFragmentListener, SignUpPasswordFragment.OnSingUpPasswordListener, SocialSignFragment.OnSocialSignListener, OfflineModeErrorHandling

    public class ConnectActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
implements EntryFragment.OnEnterFragmentListener, EmailSearchFragment.OnEmailSearchFragmentListener, BaseFieldFragment.OnSwipedBackListener, LegalAgeFragment.OnLegalAgeFragmentListener, SignUpPasswordFragment.OnSingUpPasswordListener, AccountChooserFragment.AccountChooserFragmentListener, LoginPasswordFragment.OnPasswordFragmentListener, SocialSignFragment.OnSocialSignListener, OfflineModeErrorHandling
    Manages the whole login process. This class load the needed fragment into its container, and listen for event occurred at this fragments, as field validation or a back press so it can react loading the corresponding fragments for the next steps of the process. Fragments will be responsible with making calls to the server and this Activity acts as a choreographer of the different login flows.
